### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5, y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and offshore pump(position x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0) with no connected entities

### Copper plate mine at position(x=not specified)
No information available about copper plate mine

### Copper cable factory
No information available about copper cable factory

### ERROR TIPS
*   Errors when connecting entities
    *   Make sure the entities are close enough to be connected
    *   Ensure the entities are compatible for connection
*   Errors when using pipes
    *   Ensure the pipe is connected to a valid entity
    *   Make sure the pipe is not blocked by other entities
*   Errors when placing entities
    *   Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity
    *   Make sure the entity can be placed at the specified position

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent
*   No important variables have been assigned
*   The agent has the following items in its inventory:
    *   wooden-chest: 1
    *   transport-belt: 108
    *   burner-inserter: 3
    *   small-electric-pole: 8
    *   pipe: 13
    *   stone-furnace: 1
    *   wood: 2
    *   copper-ore: 20
    *   iron-plate: 625
    *   copper-plate: 1
    *   iron-gear-wheel: 52
